title: Deep injection into a Gradle build
description: This script uses gradle to build a simple project.
setup: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget default-jdk && wget https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-6.5.1-bin.zip -P /tmp && sudo unzip -d /opt/gradle /tmp/gradle-6.5.1-bin.zip && sudo ln -s /opt/gradle/gradle-6.5.1 /opt/gradle/latest
